title: Subway Marketing Chief Promoted the $5 Footlong
sub_head: Tony Pace, who has died at age 64, also exposed evidence that advertising rebates from media companies were being abused
body:
As chief marketing officer of the Subway sandwich chain, Tony Pace made the $5 footlong a long-running hit and worked with endorsers including the swimmer Michael Phelps and the soccer star Pel√©.
Behind the scenes, he shook up the advertising industry by exposing questionable rebates paid to agencies for placing ads on behalf of clients.
